Description: Boxx Silver Tone Gents Mens Grooms Wedding Day Gifts Pocket Watches for Him available inscribed with Groom, Best man, usher, father of the bride, father of the groom or special dad on the front Item Description Payment Shipping Returns A solid and sturdy gents pocket watch by Boxx, this elegant timepiece features a silver tone dial protector decorated with a black base and white writing, with a brushed metal case back. These pocket watches are the ideal gift for him on your wedding day. Choice of six designs - see images. This listing is for one watch only - choose your style from the drop down menu. Product Features: * Quartz movement. * Includes 12 Inch Chain. * Brushed Metal Case Back. Measurements: * Chain length: 12 Inches. Also Comes With: * Presentation Box. * 1 Years Manufacturers Warranty. Brand Boxx Model number Boxx229-234 Item shape Round Display type Analogue Case material Metal Case diameter 45mm Case thickness 10mm Band material Metal Band width N/A Band colour Silver Dial color White Movement Quartz Warranty type 12 months manufacturer's warranty (unless otherwise stated in the item description) For your own peace of mind and for buyer protection, we only accept payment through PayPal. Credit card (Visa, Eurocard/Master card, Amex, and switch or Visa/Delta) Payment can be accepted ONLY through PayPal (you don’t need a PayPal account). Please make payment within 3 days of purchase. We offer fast dispatch on all items.Orders placed and paid before 3:00p.m.will usually be shipped the same day. Free delivery on most items sent in U.K. U.K. orders will be sent via Royal Mail. Estimated delivery time 3-5 working days Express next day delivery in U.K. is available for a minimal extra charge. E.U.orders will be sent via Royal Mail air mail or international signed for. Estimated delivery time 3-7 working days. Rest of the world orders will be sent via Royal Mail international signed for. Estimated delivery time 6-10 working days. There is no carrier collection on Saturday, Sunday and Bank holidays. International buyers are responsible for their foreign taxes/duties. We accept returns if the item is returned as new with all original packaging as we sent it out to you. We will happily refund the full price of the item, once it has been returned and checked. Return postage is only refunded if we are at fault or the item arrives damaged or faulty. The item must be returned to us, in its original condition, within 7 days of you receiving it. A refund will be issued within 5 working days of receipt of the returned item. For all returns please contact us via eBay messages or call 0161-740-1747 so that we can arrange a returns case for you, complete with the returns address and number, in order to speed up the refund process for you. We advise you to use recorded delivery, or a delivery service that can be tracked and traced, as parcels that do not arrive back to us cannot be refunded by us. Please contact us before leaving any negative feedback and enable us to rectify any problems with your order. If in doubt, contact us via the eBay message system before buying. Please note that for reasons of hygiene we do not accept the return of earrings for pierced ears or clip-on's under any circumstances unless faulty. Christmas extended returns policy: Purchases made on or after the 16th December will be eligible for a refund up until 8th January inclusive. Please ensure that all items are received back in our offices by 8th January.
